title: Freelance Web Developer
description:
About the job
Twine is a leading platform connecting top-tier freelancers, consultants, and contractors with companies that need creative and tech expertise. Trusted by Fortune 500 companies and innovative startups alike, Twine is the go-to marketplace for mission-critical projects. With a network of over 500,000 freelancers and 35,000+ companies, we provide a comprehensive solution for businesses looking to build agile teams and for freelancers seeking opportunities to work on high-impact projects.



At Twine, our mission is to empower creators, whether they're businesses or individual freelancers, to grow and thrive. As automation and AI reshape the workforce, we're driving the shift towards remote, freelance-driven work. We connect companies with top creative talent, enabling collaboration, innovation, and success on a global scale.



We are seeking a skilled web developer to create a QR code generator website for a personal project. This is a single, independent project with no follow-up work expected, and it can be completed remotely. The ideal candidate will have experience building similar websites and possess mid-level web development expertise.

As part of the project, you will help estimate the time required for completion and collaborate to ensure the project meets its intended goals and timeline.
company_about:
Twine connects companies to over 500,000 freelance experts across 190+ countries. We enable flexible work opportunities for so many talented people. Twine covers digital, creative and AI – Software development, graphic design, animation, marketing, video products and everything in between.AI COMPANIES (www.twine.net/ai)If you're a company that uses machine learning and needs audio-visual datasets, we can use our network of diverse freelancers to build this for you. Text to speech, video, actors, presenters, and more.STARTUPS (www.twine.net)Companies need a flexible and global workforce to keep competitive. However, they struggle to find specific experts to match their needs. If you have niche technical/creative requirements or need a freelancer in a specific location – we can help you.FREELANCERS (www.twine.net/freelancers)If you're a freelancer, take control and choose which projects you want to work on. Build your portfolio with Twine and find interesting jobs from all over the world.

title: Information Technology Support Engineer
description:
About the job
We are looking for an ONSITE IT & Desktop Support Engineer/Technician to support Casual Freelancing type tasks in your area. Would you be interested in contractual tasks? you will be paid either on an hourly or daily/half-day basis. Tickets will be dispatched with respect to your area & you may support them as per your availability (weekdays, weekends).

Tasks will be L1 & L2 IT/Networking related like desktop support, Server/Rack part (Hard disk drives, etc.) hardware installation & replacement. Provide on-site assistance (console access Router/Switch/Firewall etc.) to remote support.
company_about:
Tech Domain  Global IT Support, offshoring and Resource.                           Are you an IT outsourcer, reseller, MSP or channel partner looking to enhance your global reach? We offer 24/7 access to 5000+ trained IT engineers on every continent. Whether you need break-fix support on tight SLAs or extra resource for a global project – we can assist.With access to over 5000 IT engineers, located across 100+countries around the world - including in remote and hard to reach areas - we mean it when we say we're a global IT solutions provider.Our worldwide network of IT experts, including leading figures in their respective fields, are on hand to provide your business the global IT services you need whenever you need it. We operate 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, all over the world.Our bespoke solutions are crafted to fit your specific needs, which sets us apart from other global IT service providers. If you have budget restraints, time restraints or need a specific team of industry experts, we can work with you to deliver tailored global IT solutions, including:24x7 International IT Maintenance | An IT technician can be dispatched (with or without parts) as and when you need them to solve your problems quickly and get your business back on track. Third-party maintenance at a fraction of the cost of OEM support.Smart Hands - On-Demand Resource | Whether you need to overhaul your IT systems, relocate all your equipment or do specific changes to carry out a project, our global IT services company can help you. IMAC | ITAD | EPOS | Audio Visual | End User ComputingWhite Label IT Solutions | Use our network of certified IT technicians as an extension to your existing team.Global Wireless Surveys | Active and passive on-site wireless surveys by Ekahau & AirMagnet qualified engineersSave time and money by using us as your go-to, single point of contact for responsive, global on-site IT support.

title: Junior IT System Administrator
description:
About the job
We are The Customization Group,
a global leader in mass customization. With six global locations, our team can manufacture up to 500.000 personalized products daily, reaching millions of customers through 20+ of our own online shops and 1,000+ external shops using our solution. Our digital on-demand business model expresses our commitment to sustainability and innovation.
Our diverse team of over 500 professionals from 40 different nationalities work together to offer a wide range of high-quality products that bring happiness around the world. You will fit in here if you are a unique individual with a proactive, self-driven work attitude and a good sense of ownership.
We have a brand-new opportunity for aIn this role, you will shape the future of IT infrastructure and cybersecurity while working in
a dynamic, international team that fosters growth and innovationSounds good? Then keep reading!






Even without every qualification, your unique experiences and skills could make you a great addition to our team, so embrace the opportunities that await you here. Your journey may lead to new skills, relationships, and success.
company_about:
The Customization Group is a global market leader for customizable wall and home decoration.In our 4 factories in the USA, Poland, and Latvia, we manufacture up to 500.000 products daily, each one individually tailored to the specifications of our customers. Our know-how in tech-driven customization allows us to create excellent customer experience within our own D2C online shops and to meet the versatile demands of our B2B and API partners.

description:
About the job
Werde Teil der digitalen Zukunft!

Unser Kunde setzt sich für den Wandel in Gesellschaft und Politik ein und sucht einen talentierten Frontend-Entwickler:in (m/w/d) mit Erfahrung in UI/UX, der/die das Team bei der Weiterentwicklung innovativer digitaler Lösungen unterstützt.

Deine Aufgaben:
company_about:
🙌 Wenn dein Impact wächst, können wir den Klimawandel aufhalten. Wir VERSTEHEN deine Vision und teilen die gleichen Werte.Als Impact Recruiting Agency beraten, unterstützen und finden wir schnell passende Mitarbeiter für Start-Ups und Unternehmen mit nachhaltiger Mission, damit sie ihre Produkte schnell weiterentwickeln und verkaufen zu können, und dabei interne Ressourcen optimal zu nutzen und zu erhalten. Freiberuflich und in Festanstellung.WAS WIR TUN-	Wir BERATEN dich von der Ermittlung des Rollenbedarfs bis zu einem gutem On-Boarding-	Wir UNTERSTÜTZEN dich durch das schnelle Finden von passenden neuen Teammitgliedern-	Wir HELFEN dir bei der Vorauswahl durch intensive Qualifikations-Check-Gespräche-	Wir ZEIGEN dir, wie du deinen Recruiting Prozess etablieren und optimieren kannst-	Wir übernehmen das Recruiting KOMPLETT für dich-	Wir erstellen SOCIAL MEDIA KAMPAGNEN für mehr Bewerber-	Wir stellen dir auf STUNDENBASIS professionelle Expertise aus unserem Team zur VerfügungWIR MEINEN ES ERNST – Jobs for a better world🌱	Unser Team ist klimaaktiv, in dem wir dauerhaft Aufforstungs- und andere Klimaschutzprojekte unterstützen. 🌱	Wir bevorzugen nachhaltige Lieferant:innen und Dienstleister. Trotz höherer Kosten.🌱	Wir spenden 5% unseres Gewinnes in nachhaltige & soziale Projekte 🌱	Wir arbeiten selbstorganisiert: Für mehr Freiräume und Selbstwirksamkeit. MEHR ERFAHREN-	Folge uns hier auf LinkedIn für regelmäßige nachhaltige Inspirationen für Unternehmen und Wirtschaft, Stellenausschreibungen und Arbeitsthemen wie New Work.-	Als Greator Keynote Speaker teilt unser Gründer Volker Raddeck unsere Vision & Know How in Podcasts sowie in nachhaltigen Klima- und Wirtschaftsverbänden, wie dem BNW.KONTAKTLass uns gemeinsam herausfinden, wie wir dich dabei unterstützen können, deine Impact Idee schnell mit dem richtigen Team zu entwickeln.Du erreichst uns über:👉 Direktnachricht in LinkedIn👉 E-Mail (hallo@wernaer.de)

title: ORBIS SE - Karriere | IT Architect / Cloud Solution Architect Microsoft-365 (m/w/d)
description:
About the job
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn More
Job DescriptionWerde Teil der ORBIS Gruppe!

Innovationsfreude und Vertrauen in die Fähigkeiten jedes Einzelnen sind die Triebfedern, die ORBIS seit über 30 Jahren erfolgreich im Markt agieren und stetig wachsen lassen.

Dein Herz schlägt für Microsoft 365 Technologien und Prozessberatung? Alssorgst du bei unseren Kunden für(SharePoint, Power Platform, Azure, CRM), die sich direkt dort einbetten, wo Arbeit und Prozesse passieren. Deine Aufgabe wird es sein, diese basierend auf unseren, die Umsetzung zu steuern und auch selbst daran mitzuarbeiten. Du nutzt dabei Deine Auffassungsgabe zum Verstehen fachlicher Anforderungen und leitest daraus technische Aufgaben ab. Zudeminnerhalb des Projektteams.









Du teilst unsere Leidenschaft und Vision von der Zukunft? Dann bewirb Dich jetzt.



Mit ihrem ganzheitlichen Beratungsansatz gemäß dem Motto „Digital Business is our Passion“ unterstützt diebereits seit 2004 ihre Kunden dabei, deren individuelle Digitalstrategie zu erarbeiten und so die Chancen der Digitalisierung optimal auszuschöpfen. Diebeschäftigt derzeit über 950 Mitarbeiter:innen an nationalen und internationalen Standorten und ist Premiumpartner von SAP und Microsoft.

title: Team leader in the area of web services
description:
About the job
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn More
X

Darmstadt University of Applied Sciences

Darmstadt

Darmstadt University of Applied Sciences is looking for a permanent position in the central organizational unit IT-DuA at the earliest possible date.

Team leader in the area of web services (100 %)

Reference number: 85a/2023 K.5










Remuneration is based on pay group 13 of the collective agreement for employees of the state of Hesse (TV-H).



Darmstadt University of Applied Sciences has a plan for the advancement of women and equal opportunities. As part of the actual implementation of equal rights for men and women and the legal requirement to eliminate the underrepresentation of women within the scope of the plan for the advancement of women and equal opportunities, Darmstadt University of Applied Sciences is particularly interested in receiving applications from women. The position is generally divisible.

h_da has been awarded the "Family-friendly university in the state of Hesse" seal of approval by the Hessian Ministry of the Interior and Sport and offers its employees free travel on local public transport in the form of a Hessian state ticket for the years 2024-2026.

Have we piqued your interest?

Have we piqued your interest? Then we look forward to receiving your detailed application with the usual documents, quoting the above reference number, by 26.01.2025 to

Darmstadt University of Applied Sciences

Human Resources Department

Schöfferstraße 3

64295 Darmstadt

or

via our applicant button with attachments in PDF format.

Please only submit copies of your application documents (letter of motivation, CV, work and degree certificates), as these will be destroyed after the selection process has been completed in accordance with data protection regulations.
company_about:
Als unser Mission Statement verstehen wir unter anderem folgende Punkte: Wir wollen unseren Studentinnen und Studenten ein exzellentes Studium bieten, das sie befähigt, die Welt und die Zukunft unserer Gesellschaft mit zu gestalten. Außerdem sollen sie zu Kritikfähigkeit, sozialer Verantwortung und politischer Teilhabe befähigt werden. Für die Fachwelt und Gesellschaft wollen wir ein herausragender und verlässlicher Partner sein, der kreative und praxistaugliche Problemlösungen erarbeitet.Attraktive Studienbedingungen stehen für uns im Vordergrund. Deshalb bieten wir innovativ und interdisziplinär ausgestaltete Studiengänge, die an den Anforderungen des Arbeitsmarktes orientiert sind. Auch das Lernumfeld trägt zum Erfolg eines Studiums bei. Aus diesem Grund arbeiten und lernen unsere Studentinnen und Studenten in überschaubaren Gruppen, mit modernen didaktischen Konzepten und durch den Einsatz neuer Medien.Forschung und Entwicklung kommen an unserer Hochschule selbstverständlich auch nicht zu kurz. Im Gegenteil: Wir fördern aktiv angewandte Forschung und Entwicklung - schließlich bilden sie die Basis für exzellente Lehre und unterstützen die Einbeziehung der Studierenden in ein modernes Projektstudium. In unseren Forschungsprojekten arbeiten wir eng mit externen Partnern zusammen und tragen damit auch zur Stärkung der Region bei.Auch die Weiterbildung liegt uns am Herzen: Unsere Weiterbildungskonzepte entwickeln sich aus dem beruflichen Bedarf und den gesellschaftlichen Herausforderungen. Mit unseren Weiterbildungsangeboten begleiten und unterstützen wir die Vertiefung und Weiterentwicklung von Wissen und Erfahrung im Sinne des "lebenslangen Lernens".Neben all diesen Punkten steht die Hochschule Darmstadt auch für Internationalität, Chancengleichheit, Kundenorientierung sowie partnerschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Führung.
      
          
              …
            
              show more

title: Solution Architect Full Stack (m/w/d)
description:
About the job
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn More
Job Description

Solution Architect Full Stack (m/w/d)

Fr unsere Standorte Berlin, Dresden, Dsseldorf, Frankfurt, Hamburg, Karlsruhe, Kassel, Kln, Mannheim, Mnchen und Stuttgart

ber uns

Die PTA ist eine familiengefhrte Unternehmensberatung mit 12 Standorten in Deutschland und der Schweiz. Wir betreuen seit 1969 Kunden in Organisations- und Informationstechnologie-Projekten. Von der Projektidee ber die Konzeption und Entwicklung bis zur Einfhrung und Betreuung stehen wir unseren Kunden als kompetente Berater, Entwickler und Tester zur Seite.

Was uns anders macht? Wir sind familiengefhrt und setzen auf organisches Wachstum. Unsere Berater reisen nicht an 5 Tagen pro Woche quer durch Deutschland, sondern wir arbeiten, wann immer mglich, in Standortnhe.

Ihre Aufgaben

title: Data Entry Clerk Remote (Entry Level)
description:
About the job
Position: Remote Data Entry Clerk 

We are seeking dedicated individuals to join our team as Full Time/Part-Time Remote Data Entry Clerks. The primary responsibility of this role is to accurately input and maintain data in our systems. The ideal candidate will possess strong typing skills, impeccable attention to detail, and the ability to work with minimal supervision. You will have the opportunity to participate in national and local focus groups, clinical trials, and market research studies, which may be conducted remotely or on-site.





















This role is perfect for anyone looking for temporary, part-time, or full-time work with flexible hours, including those currently working as data entry clerks or anyone interested in a part-time, remote, work-from-home position. This is a great way to earn extra income without any prior experience required.
company_about: Providing cutting-edge solutions and strategies that drive your success.

title: Cloud Engineering Training and Internship Program
description:
About the job
Program Title : Cloud Engineering Training and Internship (M/F)
Location : Remote
Program Type : Training with Practical Internship
Duration : 3 months
Compensation : Unpaid
Learn more : https://www.refontelearning.com/
company_about:
Since 2016, we have been working non-stop to create a scientific trading robot (Scientific Algorithmic Trading) based on Artificial Intelligence and trading on the cryptocurrency futures market.The unbeatable power of our trading robot comes from the fact that our AI uses the Gaussian Mixture Model to determine clusters in the crypto market, the Hidden Markov Model to determine regime changes in the cryptomarket, Jonhson Su's model for the entry point, the Trailing Stop Loss for the exitpoint and more than 100000 explanatory variables (or features) significantly reductible by using stepwise regression.Our AI is coded ''from scratch'' entirely with the C++ programming language and performs parallel calculations on 10,000 servers (including 2000 quantum servers) distributed in 120 data centers around the world and the optimal points of the results of parallel calculations are determined by using the 'Generalized Reduced Gradient (GRG) nonlinear' method, the 'ROC Curve' and the Simplex method. Our Scientific Trading Robot has been generating a monthly profit of about 11% per month since his deployment in production in 2018. For this success, we have decided to open our Scientific Trading Robot to the general public (company and individual) in 2023.

              show more
